name: Hold the Guac
description:
Welcome to Hold the Guac, the game about the journey of a bowl of guacamole (well, kinda)

Your objective is to get the guac to the hand at the end of the level. Simple right? You must complete puzzles and use various contraptions to transfer the bowl.

(This is my submission for the Butterscotch ShenaniJam 2017. This game was made in 50 hours.)

[PRESS R TO RESTART! SERIOUSLY! YOU WILL DIE A LOT IN THIS GAME]
